{/* ðŸ‘‡ Image slider will appear here */} {/* Vision */}
Vision
Our vision is rooted in providing a blend of home-based emotional care and professionally guided special Training/ Education and therapy.
{/* Mission & Diagram */}
Our Mission
To provide a high-quality education that nurtures the holistic development of students.

To help students develop into responsible and responsive global citizens with strong moral values and an understanding of diverse cultures.
{/* About Us */}
About Us
Arunoday Special School, a project of Sewa Bharati, has commenced its activities in the year 2007 with the help of society. It is a non-residential day school for children with special needs. The current strength of school is of 42 students. Here there are children of Mental retardation, cerebral palsy, autism and also with multiple disabilities.
